General.Name: MLP Group S.A.
General.Description: MLP Group S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the purchase, development, lease, and sale of real estate properties in Poland, Germany, Romania, and Austria. It manages residential and non-residential real estate properties; and constructs buildings, as well as offers construction services. The company also leases warehouses; and operates logistics parks. It primarily serves manufacturing and logistics sectors. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Pruszków, Poland.

0.Name: Mr. Radoslaw Tomasz Krochta
